channel.title: Unpacking Packed Data Files For Matrix 704
channel.description: There are many packed data files that I want to edit like NPC spawns, drops, bonuses, item bonuses, definitions, shops, etc. How do I unpack these files? Or figure out how to make an unpacked one for the server to pack it itself?

item.title: Unpacking Packed Data Files For Matrix 704
item.dc:creator: @winK winK
item.description:
@winK wrote:

Well, I get that error.

Oh, “tool” is missing the “s”. But now I get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.io.IOException: The system cannot find the path specified at java.io.WinNTFileSystem.createFileExclusively(Native Method) at java.io.File.createNewFile(Unknown Source) at com.rs.tools.ItemListDumper.main(ItemListDumper.java:20)

Nevermind, I got it to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Unpacking Packed Data Files For Matrix 704
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

there sure is this is for unpacking u can figure the rest out

@echo off
title Dick Sucker
echo starting…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -cp bin;lib/* com.rs.tool.ItemListDumper
pause

Read full topic
